pastiche.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a piece of writing, music, film etc that is deliberately made in the style of someone or something else
pastiche.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The film is a pastiche of the Hollywood Wild West.
pastiche.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a work of art that consists of a variety of different styles put together
pastiche.translation[0].definitions[2].d: the practice of making a piece of writing, music, film etc using the style of something else or using a variety of different styles
